TopicTitle: If you make something in the mission builder will it end up in Career?

Articles.Content:
If I made a new mission in the mission builder, is there a way I can get that into my full campaign?

Thanks!

This is exactly why I only got making history for the parts/extra bases etc back when I got it. The mission builder is something that should have been usable within sandbox, science and career modes on a whim to change things up! This is why I've never had much use of it and was a bit disappointed in it, was a huge missed opportunity there that I hope can be addressed in the future.
